cause.description:
Search for Me is a local ministry that is laying foundations in Indiana. Some remodeling is necessary for the facility, and so we're asking for help in any way such as prayer, donations of supplies and /or funds
1. Mankind is having an identity crisis
2. Our identities are only found in Christ
3. Everyone needs to know this
cause.mission: Raise Support for SFM in order to preach the gospel
cause.name: SFM Ministries Support
